text: The Mexican Heritage Plaza is a cultural center in San Jose, California, USA that opened in 1999. It is operated by the School of Arts and Culture. The plaza includes a 500-seat theater, gardens, classrooms, and meeting spaces. ==External links== *Official website *Online video tour of Mexican Heritage Plaza (scrolling the image may not work on all browsers) Category:Buildings and structures in San Jose, California Category:Culture of San Jose, California Category:Mexican-American culture in California
title: Mexican Heritage Plaza
